name: Surfin' the Void (The Space Mühle)
description:
Play a game of Muehle against a friend or enemy and try to win with a strategy or completely by chance.

Rules

You start with 9 stones. Place all on the field and try to get a Muehle to take away one of your opponents stones.  You have a Muehle when you have a stone on 3 adjacent fields. You can take away one stone only when the new Muehle was placed.

You have won when your opponent has less than 3 stones left, including the stones that can be placed.

After you  have placed all of your stones on the board you have to move your stones to an adjacent field.

When you have only 3 stones left, you can jump to any free field on the board.

There are several items that you can collect when you set a stone on a field with that item. You can only hold one item at a time and when you use it your turn is over.

Controls

Start the game by clicking on the start screen. You can play against the computer by pressing space on the title screen.

Close the game with escape.

Click on a free field to place a stone.

To move a stone first click on the stone to select it, then click on a field on which the stone can be placed.

When you click on your item slot you can use your item. When you have to select a field to use the item on, click on that field.

When there are no moves available, you can use an item if you have one or click on your planet to skip a round.

Try to finish the game before the Comet destroys the board.
